page.title: 16Father & Son Scout Camp.
page.content: On Saturday 6th July, my brother, my dad and I went to the {Braintree District Camp,}at{Shalford {Hall Farm.}My brother and I go to{1st {Finchingfield Foxes. We were split up into four sites called Sub-camps. We were with{1st {Cressing}and{1st Felstead packs.}We roasted a pig on a spit. We made paper aeroplanes, whistles and plaster casts of leaves. We made rafts, raced them, paddled and swam in the river {Pant.}There was a rope bridge and an obstacle course. We played cricket, football and rounders. We sang round a camp fire. We were all given a badge before we left at about 5p.m. on Sunday. The weather was very pleasant. We all enjoyed ourselves very much and I look forward to next year's camp.
